description: This file initializes and exports a Supabase client instance for use in a React frontend application. It imports the createClient function from the '@supabase/supabase-js' library, defines functions to retrieve environment variables for configuration, and creates a singleton instance of the Supabase client which is exported as the default.

methods.name: getSupabaseEnv()
methods.description: Returns the environment variables REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL and REACT_APP_SUPABASE_KEY needed to configure the Supabase client.

methods.name: createSupabase()
methods.description: Creates and returns a configured Supabase client instance using the environment variables.
